insert into ht_poundage_detail (nid,borrow_nid,borrow_type,create_time,usernname,invite_region_name,source,amount,invite_user_id,ledger_id,ledger_time,poundage_type) (SELECT bt.nid, bt.borrow_nid, bpt.borrow_name as borrowType, br.create_time, hu.username, bt.invite_region_name as inviteRegionName, '服务费' AS source, truncate(bt.loan_fee * oatp.service_ratio,2) AS amount, bt.invite_user_id as inviteUserId, oatp.id as ledgerId, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)) as ledgerTime, '投资人分账' FROM ht_borrow_tender bt INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_recover br ON br.borrow_nid = bt.borrow_nid AND br.nid = bt.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = bi.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hu.user_id = bt.user_id INNER join ( select od.name,hpl.id,hpl.service_ratio,hpl.project_type,hpl.source from ht_poundage_ledger hpl inner join ht_r_oa_department od on od.id = hpl.investor_company_id where hpl.type = 1 and if(hpl.source =0,1=1,hpl.source = 1) and hpl.status=0 ) oatp on oatp.name = bt.invite_region_name WHERE ( b.`status` in (4,5) OR ( b.`status` = 3 AND b.reverify_status <> 0 ) ) AND br.create_time >= CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)),'') AND br.create_time < CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()),'') AND bt.invite_department_id IS NOT NULL AND bt.invite_department_id > 0 AND (oatp.project_type = 0 or FIND_IN_SET(bpt.id,oatp.project_type))) union all
(SELECT bt.nid, bt.borrow_nid, bpt.borrow_name, br.recover_yestime, hu.username, br.invite_region_name, '管理费' AS serviceName, truncate(br.recover_fee * oatp.manage_ratio,2) AS service_price, if(bt.invite_user_id =0,bt.user_id,bt.invite_user_id), oatp.id, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)), '投资人分账' FROM ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS bt ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover AS br ON br.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid and bt.user_id = br.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = bi.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hu.user_id = bt.user_id INNER join ( select od.name,hpl.id,hpl.manage_ratio,hpl.project_type,hpl.source from ht_poundage_ledger hpl inner join ht_r_oa_department od on od.id = hpl.investor_company_id where hpl.type = 1 and if(hpl.source =0,1=1,hpl.source = 3) and hpl.status=0 ) oatp on oatp.name = bt.invite_region_name WHERE br.recover_yestime >= CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)),'') AND br.recover_yestime < CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()),'') AND br.recover_status = 1 AND bt.invite_department_id IS NOT NULL AND bt.invite_department_id > 0 AND (oatp.project_type = 0 or FIND_IN_SET(bpt.id,oatp.project_type)) AND b.borrow_style not in ('principal','month','endmonth') AND bt.nid not in (select credit_tender_nid from ht_credit_tender))
union all
(SELECT ct.assign_nid, ct.bid_nid, bpt.borrow_name, ct.create_time, hu.username, ct.invite_user_regionname, '债转服务费' AS serviceName, truncate(ct.credit_fee * oatp.credit_ratio,2) AS credit_fee, hui.user_id, oatp.id, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)), '投资人分账' FROM ht_credit_tender ct LEFT JOIN ht_borrow b ON b.borrow_nid = ct.bid_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = bi.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hu.user_id = ct.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hui ON hui.username = ct.invite_user_name INNER join ( select od.name,hpl.id,hpl.credit_ratio,hpl.project_type,hpl.source from ht_poundage_ledger hpl inner join ht_r_oa_department od on od.id = hpl.investor_company_id where hpl.type = 1 and if(hpl.source =0,1=1,hpl.source = 2) and hpl.status=0 ) oatp on oatp.name = ct.invite_user_regionname WHERE ct.create_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)) AND ct.create_time < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()) AND ct.invite_user_regionname IS NOT NULL AND ct.invite_user_regionname != '' AND (oatp.project_type = 0 or FIND_IN_SET(bpt.id,oatp.project_type)))
union all
(SELECT hcr.assign_nid, hcr.bid_nid, bpt.borrow_name, hcr.assign_repay_yes_time, hu.username, ct.invite_user_regionname, '管理费' AS serviceName, truncate(hcr.manage_fee * oatp.manage_ratio,2) AS credit_fee, hui.user_id, oatp.id, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)), '投资人分账' FROM ht_credit_repay hcr LEFT JOIN ht_credit_tender ct ON ct.credit_nid = hcr.credit_nid and ct.user_id = hcr.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow b ON b.borrow_nid = ct.bid_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = bi.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hu.user_id = ct.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hui ON hui.username = ct.invite_user_name INNER join ( select od.name,hpl.id,hpl.manage_ratio,hpl.project_type,hpl.source from ht_poundage_ledger hpl inner join ht_r_oa_department od on od.id = hpl.investor_company_id where hpl.type = 1 and if(hpl.source =0,1=1,hpl.source = 3) and hpl.status=0 ) oatp on oatp.name = ct.invite_user_regionname WHERE hcr.assign_repay_yes_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)) AND hcr.assign_repay_yes_time < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()) AND hcr.`status` = 1 AND ct.invite_user_regionname IS NOT NULL AND ct.invite_user_regionname != '' AND (oatp.project_type = 0 or FIND_IN_SET(bpt.id,oatp.project_type)) AND b.borrow_style not in ('principal','month','endmonth')) union ALL (SELECT '--', bt.borrow_nid, bpt.borrow_name as borrowType, br.create_time, '--', '--', '服务费' AS source, truncate(sum(bt.loan_fee) * oatp.service_ratio,2) AS amount, 0, oatp.id as ledgerId, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)) as ledgerTime, '借款人分账' FROM ht_borrow_tender bt INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_recover br ON br.borrow_nid = bt.borrow_nid AND br.nid = bt.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = bi.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hu.user_id = bt.user_id INNER join ( select hsc.cooperate_num,hpl.user_id,hpl.id,hpl.service_ratio,hpl.project_type,hpl.source from ht_poundage_ledger hpl left join ht_sub_commission_list_config hsc on hsc.user_id = hpl.user_id where hpl.type = 2 and if(hpl.source =0,1=1,hpl.source = 1) and hpl.status=0 ) oatp on oatp.cooperate_num = bi.inst_code WHERE ( b.`status` in (4,5) OR ( b.`status` = 3 AND b.reverify_status <> 0 ) ) AND br.create_time >= CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)),'') AND br.create_time < CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()),'') AND bt.invite_department_id IS NOT NULL AND bt.invite_department_id > 0 AND (oatp.project_type = 0 or FIND_IN_SET(bpt.id,oatp.project_type)) group by bt.borrow_nid,oatp.id) union all
(SELECT '--', br.borrow_nid, bpt.borrow_name, br.recover_yestime, '--', '--', '管理费' AS serviceName, truncate(sum(br.recover_fee) * oatp.manage_ratio,2) AS service_price, 0, oatp.id, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)), '借款人分账' FROM ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover AS br ON br.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = bi.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hu.user_id = br.user_id INNER join ( select hsc.cooperate_num,hpl.user_id,hpl.id,hpl.manage_ratio,hpl.project_type,hpl.source from ht_poundage_ledger hpl left join ht_sub_commission_list_config hsc on hsc.user_id = hpl.user_id where hpl.type = 2 and if(hpl.source =0,1=1,hpl.source = 3) and hpl.status=0 ) oatp on oatp.cooperate_num = bi.inst_code WHERE br.recover_yestime >= CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)),'') AND br.recover_yestime < CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()),'') AND br.recover_status = 1 AND br.invite_department_id IS NOT NULL AND br.invite_department_id > 0 AND (oatp.project_type = 0 or FIND_IN_SET(bpt.id,oatp.project_type)) AND b.borrow_style not in ('principal','month','endmonth') group by br.borrow_nid,oatp.id)
union all (SELECT bt.nid, bt.borrow_nid, bpt.borrow_name, br.recover_yestime, hu.username, bt.invite_region_name, '管理费' AS serviceName, truncate((br.recover_fee_yes-br.credit_manage_fee) * oatp.manage_ratio,2) AS service_price, if(bt.invite_user_id =0,bt.user_id,bt.invite_user_id), oatp.id, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)), '投资人分账' FROM ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS bt ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover_plan AS br ON br.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid and bt.user_id = br.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = bi.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hu.user_id = bt.user_id INNER join ( select od.name,hpl.id,hpl.manage_ratio,hpl.project_type,hpl.source from ht_poundage_ledger hpl inner join ht_r_oa_department od on od.id = hpl.investor_company_id where hpl.type = 1 and if(hpl.source =0,1=1,hpl.source = 3) and hpl.status=0 ) oatp on oatp.name = bt.invite_region_name WHERE br.recover_yestime >= CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)),'') AND br.recover_yestime < CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()),'') AND br.recover_status = 1 AND bt.invite_department_id IS NOT NULL AND bt.invite_department_id > 0 AND (oatp.project_type = 0 or FIND_IN_SET(bpt.id,oatp.project_type)))
UNION ALL (SELECT hcr.assign_nid, hcr.bid_nid, bpt.borrow_name, hcr.assign_repay_yes_time, hu.username, ct.invite_user_regionname, '管理费' AS serviceName, truncate(hcr.manage_fee * oatp.manage_ratio,2) AS credit_fee, if(hu1.user_id =0,ct.user_id,hu1.user_id), oatp.id, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)), '投资人分账' FROM ht_credit_repay hcr LEFT JOIN ht_credit_tender ct on ct.assign_nid = hcr.assign_nid and ct.user_id = hcr.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow b ON b.borrow_nid = hcr.bid_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = bi.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hu.user_id = ct.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hu1 ON hu1.username = ct.invite_user_name INNER join ( select od.name,hpl.id,hpl.manage_ratio,hpl.project_type,hpl.source from ht_poundage_ledger hpl inner join ht_r_oa_department od on od.id = hpl.investor_company_id where hpl.type = 1 and if(hpl.source =0,1=1,hpl.source = 3) and hpl.status=0 ) oatp on oatp.name = ct.invite_user_regionname WHERE hcr.assign_repay_yes_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)) AND hcr.assign_repay_yes_time < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()) AND hcr.`status` = 1 AND ct.invite_user_regionname IS NOT NULL AND ct.invite_user_regionname != '' AND (oatp.project_type = 0 or FIND_IN_SET(bpt.id,oatp.project_type)))
union all
(SELECT '--', br.borrow_nid, bpt.borrow_name, br.recover_yestime, '--', '--', '管理费' AS serviceName, truncate(sum(br.recover_fee_yes) * oatp.manage_ratio,2) AS service_price, 0, oatp.id, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)), '借款人分账' FROM ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover_plan AS br ON br.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = bi.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hu.user_id = br.user_id INNER join ( select hsc.cooperate_num,hpl.user_id,hpl.id,hpl.manage_ratio,hpl.project_type,hpl.source from ht_poundage_ledger hpl left join ht_sub_commission_list_config hsc on hsc.user_id = hpl.user_id where hpl.type = 2 and if(hpl.source =0,1=1,hpl.source = 3) and hpl.status=0 ) oatp on oatp.cooperate_num = bi.inst_code WHERE br.recover_yestime >= CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)),'') AND br.recover_yestime < CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()),'') AND br.recover_status = 1 AND br.invite_department_id IS NOT NULL AND br.invite_department_id > 0 AND (oatp.project_type = 0 or FIND_IN_SET(bpt.id,oatp.project_type)) group by br.borrow_nid,oatp.id)

insert into ht_poundage (user_id,amount,quantity,poundage_time,status,create_time,ledger_id) SELECT hpl.user_id, (select sum(hpd.amount) from ht_poundage_detail hpd where hpd.ledger_id = hpl.id and hpd.ledger_time = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day))) as amount, (select count(hpd.id) from ht_poundage_detail hpd where hpd.ledger_id = hpl.id and hpd.ledger_time = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day))) as quantity, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)) as poundage_time, 0 as status, unix_timestamp(now()) as create_time, hpl.id FROM ht_poundage_ledger hpl left join ht_r_user hu on hu.username = hpl.username where hpl.status=0 and (select sum(hpd.amount) from ht_poundage_detail hpd where hpd.ledger_id = hpl.id and hpd.ledger_time = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day))) is not null and (select sum(hpd.amount) from ht_poundage_detail hpd where hpd.ledger_id = hpl.id and hpd.ledger_time = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day))) != 0
